subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With the help of Moises Alou, the Mets’ lead over Atlanta in the division was restored to four and half games, which is where it was when the Braves came to town Tuesday.
snippet: With the help of Moises Alou, the Mets’ lead over Atlanta in the division was restored to four and half games, which is where it was when the Braves came to town Tuesday.
